author: Special Correspondent
text: Robotic academy IroboChakra in collaboration with Novatech Robo and Lawerence Technological University, Michigan, is organising International Robotic Competition, Robofest 2016 here at Chinmaya Vidya Niketan School on February 27 and 28. The topics for the competition are RoboGolf (RoboPutting) and Bottle Sumo. Winners of the competition will get an invite from Lawerence Technological University, Michigan to participate in the Finals of World Robofest 2016 Competition. The last date for registration is February 20. For details, contact- 8490912444.
title: Robotic competition
